posts.title: Join Volunteers
posts.description: Join volunteers and help Ukrainian Army and refugees

popup.title: Join Volunteers
popup.description: A non-profit organization whose mission is to create a culture of volunteerism and mutual assistance in Ukraine.

posts.title: Donations
posts.description: The goal of this organization is to help Ukrainian Army and refugees

popup.title: Our mission
popup.description: UNITED24 was launched by the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy as the main venue for collecting charitable donations in support of Ukraine. Funds will be transferred to the official accounts of the National Bank of Ukraine and allocated by assigned ministries to cover the most pressing needs

posts.title: Become Volunteer
posts.description: You can become volonteer and help alot

popup.title: Become Volunteer
popup.description: You can be useful without weapons in hand! You can be safe and at the same time wage war on the information front, provide psychological assistance, join the humanitarian assembly.

popup.title: 24/7 support
popup.description: Ukrainian refugee Support Program. To apply, check more information by the link

popup.title: Educational Opportunities
popup.description: Many universities have expressed willingness to offer support to Ukrainians working and studying abroad as well as to students and academics who have already fled the country. The support is mainly academic, financial, legal advice.
